metadata.description:
This song started from a quick voice memo I had recorded on my phone yesterday, and I wanted to see if it was possible to turn it into a fully-produced song live on my twitch stream. 

"Make Me Believe" was written, recorded, produced, mixed, mastered and released in less than 24 hours, and you can watch the production stream replay here: https://www.twitch.tv/dotmvsic

lyrics.text:
You remind me
To take some time to breathe
You can be human
And it's okay to feel
Say it out loud

Take some time to breathe
You can be human
And it's okay to feel

You make me believe
You make me believe
Believe in Love again

metadata.name: Make Me Believe #1
metadata.title: Make Me Believe
